name: Catalogue: First Stage
description:
You are the Catalogue, a traveler seeking knowledge. 

Explore a hand-drawn island, learn from its inhabitants, and overcome its trials.

  • Engage in fast-paced arcade shooter combat to clear shrines
  • Complete card dungeons and brew essences to uncover runes that extend and enhance your combat abilities
  • Gather ingredients and chat with NPCs

The content present in this version of Catalogue showcases the game's core systems, and can be played through in one or two sittings.
